directions.text: Season tenderloin liberally on all sides with salt and pepper.
Place on a wire rack set on a baking sheet.
Slice meat into 2 inch steaks and season cut portions with salt and pepper.
Heat the oil and butter in a 12" cast-iron skillet on high heat.
Cook each side of the steaks for 1 min.
Tent steaks with foil and let rest for 5 mins.
